titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Energy and Commerce in the One Hundred Eleventh Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Provides amounts for the expenses of the House Committee on Energy and Commerce for the 111th Congress.
